short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just click on the extension and get QRCode of Currently opened URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension provides feature to generate QR code of the searched URL. So you can use the same URL on phone by scanning the QR. It reduce your effort to type the complex url into the mobile or relevant devices.
